1721401.clue_desc:
What gift do I want? I heard you went to
Xu Heng recently. Why don't you bring me back a Yu Jing shadow puppet?

1721402.clue_desc:
Master says I already have a good handle on the Arcanum,
so I've decided to descend the mountain and travel around the world!

1721403.clue_desc: That landscape has always been in my heart, and I'm already on my way to reach it.

19226101.clue_desc:
When in a hallway, never move in a direction
that would take you out of the mansion.

19226102.clue_desc: No one may leave the Karasugo mansion until the mission is complete.

19226103.clue_desc:
Don't believe any of the Karasugo servants.
Don't let a single one of them leave the mansion.

19226104.clue_desc: The Crow God is dead. Cancelling request for reinforcements.

19226105.clue_desc:
If you encounter other agents,
make sure they know the above instructions, too.

2221401.clue_desc: Urgent: Sasanami has disappeared from the Photon Rail network. Reasons unknown.

2221402.clue_desc: Do I... know my own mind?

2221403.clue_desc: "The sword can move freely when the mind is clear."

2221404.clue_desc: "I have never drawn 'Sakuragiri.' I get a strange feeling whenever I touch its scabbard..."

2822601.clue_desc:
The Midnight Thorns gang in northern Gharpur
has absorbed the remaining members of other gangs and grown into a powerful force.

2822602.clue_desc:
Meruism keeps Gharpur's fragile balance, but to the evil ones, this
balance is just another obstacle...

2822603.clue_desc:
Biotech, a leading biological researcher, holds
vast capital and power and is rumored to be engaged in forbidden research.

2822604.clue_desc:
Infinite Power got its start in popular fighting events
and developed many heavy factories and armed forces for security purposes.

2822605.clue_desc:
The leader of the Burning Scars, a large gang in western Gharpur,
craves chaos, and the expansion of his armaments is a reflection of his ambition.

3622601.clue_desc:
The Midnight Thorns gang in northern Gharpur
has absorbed the remaining members of other gangs and grown into a powerful force.

3622602.clue_desc:
Meruism keeps Gharpur's fragile balance, but to the evil ones, this
balance is just another obstacle...

Biotech, a leading biological researcher, holds
vast capital and power and is rumored to be engaged in forbidden research.

3622604.clue_desc:
Infinite Power got its start in popular fighting events
and developed many heavy factories and armed forces for security purposes.

3622605.clue_desc:
The leader of the Burning Scars, a large gang in western Gharpur,
craves chaos, and the expansion of his armaments is a reflection of his ambition.

3021401.clue_desc: Dark clouds cover the sky, and someone is eagerly awaiting the arrival of the storm.

3021402.clue_desc: The plan is about to be implemented, but some have differing opinions.

3021403.clue_desc: Under pressure, some choose to stand fast for what they believe is "right."

3221411.clue_desc: I came here as a companion... with someone like my brother. He might be facing a huge crisis that could potentially destroy this city right now.

3221412.clue_desc: My other friend, who lived with me for a long time, is now missing, being hunted by villains to protect me.

3221413.clue_desc: I have always relied on their care; without them, I wouldn't be able to do many things...

3221414.clue_desc: Now that they are no longer by my side, I actually feel very scared and guilty. If I were a bit more useful, maybe I wouldn't have to be separated from them.

3221415.clue_desc: I don't want to trouble them anymore; I'm just satisfied to be able to help a little behind the scenes.

2922601.clue_desc: Aragami cannot be killed; they are essentially a bunch of "Oracle Cells."

2922602.clue_desc: The "Oracle Cell" is a "creature" that can devour almost anything, constantly mutating and growing.

2922603.clue_desc: "Mutation", some more powerful Aragami may have different special abilities.

2922604.clue_desc: The Aragami are made up of Oracle Cells. Destroy enough of them and you'll destabilize their form.

2922605.clue_desc: The one who operates the God Arc is also known as a "God Eater."
